sentences.en: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt everyday.
sentences.cn: 成功的婚姻是座天天都要重建的大厦.

sentences.en: An edifice ought to be, moreover, suitable to the climate.
sentences.cn: 此外, 任何一座建筑还应当与气候条件相适应.

sentences.en: He surveyed the edifice from the outside and admired greatly.
sentences.cn: 他从外边打量着大厦,对它赞美备至.

sentences.en: His theory of justice was elaborate and forms a cornerstone of his philosophical edifice.
sentences.cn: 他详尽阐述的正义理论形成了其哲学体系的基石.

sentences.en: In this edifice it was determined I should lodge.
sentences.cn: 他们决定我就住在古庙这所大建筑物里.

sentences.en: It is an edifice of the transition period.
sentences.cn: 巴黎圣母院是一种过渡性的建筑物.

sentences.en: Meanwhile the floors tie the inner frame to the outer one, bracing the entire edifice.
sentences.cn: 同时,每层的地板则将内外支架联系在一起, 以撑起整栋建筑.

sentences.en: Rockfeller critics were fond of accusing him of having an " edifice complex . "
sentences.cn: 批评 洛克菲勒 的人喜欢挖苦他,说他患有建筑狂.

sentences.en: Screams were listend and black smoke billowed from the century - old edifice.
sentences.cn: 尖叫声响起,这座百年建筑浓烟滚滚.

sentences.en: The legislature is housed in an impressive granite edifice.
sentences.cn: 立法机构位于一幢引人注目的花岗岩大楼里.

sentences.en: Their head office was an imposing edifice.
sentences.cn: 他们的总部大楼是一幢宏伟建筑。

sentences.en: Their new manifesto hardly threatens to bring the whole edifice of capitalism crashing down.
sentences.cn: 他们新的宣言声称要摧毁整个资本主义大厦，这是不可能的。

sentences.en: There is a huge Victorian edifice in the area.
sentences.cn: 该地区有一幢维多利亚式的庞大建筑物.

sentences.en: This edifice is not a type.
sentences.cn: 整座建筑算不上是一种典型.

sentences.en: This song proceeded from the gloomy edifice which towered above the garden.
sentences.cn: 歌声是从园中最高的那所大楼里传来的.

trans.tran_en: a building, especially a large one
